system.appearance: Come in a wide variety of forms, often look like something somewhere between a huge predatory fish and a sea snake with very heavy scales.

overview.base:
Can wield @L[Property:Two-Handed]{two-handed} weapons in one hand.
Note: @L[Property:AP]{AP} weapons must still be wielded in two hands to be @L[Property:AV0]{AV0}.

results.hit: Target is @L[Condition:Dead]{dead}, @L[Condition:Ruined]{ruined}, and their @L[Core:Size]{SIZE} is reduced by 1. If their @L[Core:Size]{SIZE} was already less than 1, it is reduced to 0.

overview.base: You gain @L[Ability:Offensive Martial Arts]{Offensive Martial Arts} and @L[Ability:Defensive Martial Arts]{Defensive Martial Arts}.

Your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands} count as @L[Category:Weapons]{weapons} for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by (although they cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Attack Interaction]{attack} with them and their damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].

Your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands} count as @L[Category:Shields]{shields} for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Block Interaction]{block} with them and their @L[Core:Block Value]{BV} is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands @L[Property:Blocking]{blocking}.
You always have at least 3 @L[Core:AV]{AV}. This is the case even when you are not wearing @L[Category:Armor]{armor}.
You can see in the dark up to 60 feet.
You cannot use items in your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands}.
You gain @L[Ability:Bite]{Bite} and become @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{fluent} in it. Additionally, your @L[Category:Equipment]{mouth} is @L[Property:AV0]{AV0}.

Your @L[Equipment:Mouth]{mouth} counts as a @L[Category:Weapons]{weapon} for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by it (although it cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Attack Interaction]{attack} with it and its damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].
You can stay under water indefinitely without @L[Core:Drowning]{drowning}.
You have @L[Ability:Swimming]{Swimming} and @L[Ability:Diving]{Diving} but have @L[Core:Movement Speed]{no walk speed}.
You no longer have to stay on the surface of water while @L[Ability:Swimming]{Swimming}.
